titleStmt.title: The primitive rule of reformation delivered in a sermon before His Maiesty at Whitehall, Feb. 1, 1662 in vindication of our Church against the novelties of Rome by Tho. Pierce.
titleStmt.author: Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.

editionStmt.edition: The sixt edition, more correct then the London impressions /

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.H. for Ric. Royston and Ric. Davis,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
